author: Staff Reporter
text: Poongodi (30) of Uthangarai on Monday attempted to commit suicide after feeding her three children fertilizers. Rohini (9), and Abhirami (11) died. The mother and her five-year-old son are admitted to a private hospital. The police said that Poongodi was depressed because of her husband Shanmuga sundaram’s habits. He had recently bought a new tractor on loan. He continued to squander away his earnings on alcohol.
title: Woman kills children, attempts suicide
